column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////From your review
column3: it sounds like your server did provide good service
column4: and for that I am grateful. However
column5: this hurried atmosphere is no excuse to forego greetings or decorum when interacting with customers. I have spoken (and will continue to speak) to my front of house about this issue and how best to avoid it in the future. In addition
column6: management is still trying to determine a workaround for minor traffic jams caused by customers clustering near the side of the bar while waiting for tables to open. Unfortunately
column7: this is an area where our hostesses
column9: bartenders and barbacks must move around a lot in order to provide drinks and food for their customers. We will work harder.
